Package org.apache.activemq.artemis.core.persistence.impl.journal

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractJournalStorageManager
    Controls access to the journals and other storage files such as the ones used to store pages and large messages.
    AckDescribe  
    AddMessageRecord  
    BatchingIDGenerator
    An ID generator that allocates a batch of IDs of size BatchingIDGenerator.checkpointSize and records the ID in the journal only when starting a new batch.
    BatchingIDGenerator.IDCounterEncoding  
    BufferSplitter
    this class will split a big buffer into smaller buffers
    BufferSplitter.PartialEncoding  
    DescribeJournal
    Outputs a String description of the Journals contents.
    DescribeJournal.MessageDescribe  
    DescribeJournal.ReferenceDescribe  
    DummyOperationContext  
    JDBCJournalStorageManager  
    JournalRecordIds
    These record IDs definitions are meant to be public.
    JournalStorageManager  
    LargeBody  
    LargeMessageTXFailureCallback  
    LargeServerMessageImpl  
    LargeServerMessageInSync  
    OperationContextImpl
    Each instance of OperationContextImpl is associated with an executor (usually an ordered Executor).
    TXLargeMessageConfirmationOperation
